nodes.text: Lucas Marangon is primarily known as the artist of the Tag & Bink comic stories, written by Kevin Rubio for Dark Horse Comics, and has also illustrated other short pieces, mostly humor-related, in Star Wars Tales, including "Marooned", for which he also wrote the script. He was also the cover colorist for the Star Wars: General Grievous series, and the penciller and cover artist for Qui-Gon and Obi-Wan: The Aurorient Express. Currently, he works as the official Star Wars illustrator for Disney LATAM.
